main event: A civilian observed a lighted shape in the sky while traveling on Route 66 in Chatham, NY, for about 45 minutes.
interesting points: The observer noted that the object had a rectangular shape with square corners,The object appeared luminous with oscillating lights,The lights had spike-like arms of varied lengths,No noise was reported from the object,Several cars were passing by, but the observer did not report it immediately.
sighted object: a luminous rectangular shape in the sky
witness description: a civilian traveling home on Route 66
